title: The so called "Dio's SCiPtember 2024 pandemonium" art page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:hansarp]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hello there! Take a seat! Or don't! I'm not your mom, thankfully. Welcome to the:

> DIOGENE_S scIpTEMBER ART EXTRAVAGANZA!!!!!!

or however the title of this page goes.

Each day of this here [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sciptember-2024 SCiPtember] I will be adding a small drawing to a big drawing. At the end of the month here there will be a marvelous image full of whimsy and chaos and baliga balaga. So, stay tuned!

++++ DAY 1. //Three white horses walk into a bar//

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/pending#pages pending]

@@ @@
[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%201.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-7003 |SCP-7003]]] by [[*user TheyCallMeTim]] and [[[scp-7689 |SCP-7689]]] by [[*user Prismal]] and [[*user Pedagon]]

------

++++ DAY 2. //Me, an empath//

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/empathic#pages empathic]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%202.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-4966 |SCP-4966]]] by [[*user Deadly Bread]], [[[scp-2689 |SCP-2689]]] by [[*user WinkWonkBoi]] and [[[scp-5721 |SCP-5721]]] by [[*user Cerastes]].

------

++++ DAY 3. //Totally not appliance war propaganda//

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/appliance#pages appliance]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%203.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-2704 |SCP-2704]]] by [[*user FlyPurgatorio]] and [[*user SYTYCFanon]] and [[[scp-3883 |SCP-3883]]] by [[*user Zyn]] and [[*user Sly161]].

------

++++ Day 4. --Marcel-- Ruiz Duchamp would hate me for this.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/surrealist-fiction#pages surrealist-fiction]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%204.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[the-museum-of-shapes-welcomes-you |The Museum Of Shapes Welcomes You!]]] by [[*user Dr Vikki Lost]], [[[a-cooler-manifesto |A Cooler Manifesto]]] by [[*user Randomini]] and [[[inverted-swiss-cheese |Inverted Swiss Cheese]]] by [[*user Ethagon]].

------

++++ Day 5. Kissing? eeeew

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/romance#pages romance]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%205.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[the-golden-threads-weaving-us-together |The Golden Threads Weaving Us Together]]] by [[*user Nonacherontia]] and [[*user Miss Lapis]] and [[[cos-tu-smierdzi |Something's Fishy]]] by [[*user EvilAngel413]] and [[*user Zygard]].

------

++++ Day 6. She phe in my nome till I non.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/phenomenon phenomenon]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%206.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-8820 |SCP-8820]]] by [[*user misterfrown]] and [[[scp-4010 |SCP-4010]]] by [[*user Utylike]]

------

++++ Day 7. midwest emo coded derealization

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/unreality-dept unreality-dept]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%207.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-8195 |SCP-8195]]] by [[*user syuzhet]], [[[scp-6352 |SCP-6352]]] by [[*user fabuia]] and [[[burger |Alex Thorley eats a burger]]] by [[*user syuzhet]]

------

++++ Day 8. The fucking fermi paradox, am I right, fellas?

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/extraterrestrial extraterrestrial]
@@ @@

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%208.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-7724 |SCP-7724]]] by [[*user Liryn]], [[*user Prismal]] and [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[[scp-6150 |SCP-6150]]] by [[*user Elenee Fishtruck]]. Additionally, this day is the widely celebrated Breachmas, as pictured in [[[scp-5243 |SCP-5243]]] by [[*user HarryBlank]], thus, I drew the seven "survivors" of that event for today. Because 'tis the season!

------

++++ Day 9. In spanish we call these "infopeligrosos", which is ridiculous.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/infohazard infohazard]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20catchup%206.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-pl-253 |SCP-PL-253]]] by [[*user blazingpie]] and [[*user jasiu06]] and [[[scp-2921 |SCP-2921]]] by [[*user billith]]

------

++++ Day 10. Oooooh, the beyond

**Tag of the day:** [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/afterlife afterlife]]]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20catchup%207.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-8995 |SCP-8995]]] by [[*user Sound Chaser]] and [[[scp-4661 |SCP-4661]]] by [[*user rounderhouse]]

------

++++ Day 11. I get it, I get it. Night fell. But why doesn't it get up? 

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/nightfall nightfall]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20catchup%208.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** the [[[qui-lactis |Qui Lactis]]] series by [[*user Lordxvnv]]

------

++++ Day 12. Magic or some bullshit.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/thaumaturgy thaumaturgy]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%2012.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[scp-4942 |SCP-4942]]] by [[*user stormbreath]] and [[[scp-7636 |SCP-7636]]] by [[*user Pedantique]].

------

++++ Day 13. Honk mimimi.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/but-a-dream but a dream]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%2013.jpg]]

**Article drawn:** [[[scp-7755 |SCP-7755]]] by [[*user crow-cat]].

------

++++ Day 14. A pretty boring guy, judging from the name.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/the-administrator the-administrator]

[[image dio-SCiPtember%20day%2014.jpg]]

**Article drawn:** [[[revelation |Revelation]]] by [[*user thedeadlymoose]]

------

++++ Day 15. Humanity FUCK YEAH

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/unhuman unhuman]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%2015.jpg]]

**Article drawn:** [[[the-unhuman-experience-former-prime-minister-harold-holt |The Unhuman Experience: Former Prime Minister Harold Holt]]]

------

++++ Day 16. I wasn't alive back then.

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/class-of-76 class-of-76]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%2016.jpg]]

**Article drawn:** I just drew the class of 76 itself. Sue me.

------

++++ Day 24. i shat my pants

**Tag of the day:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/psychological-horror psychological-horror]

[[image Dio-SCiPtember%20day%2024.jpg]]

**Articles drawn:** [[[backtobed |Heading off to bed]]] by [[*user troutmaskreplica]] and [[[a-matter-of-perception |A Matter of Perception]]] by [[*user UNCGriffin]].

+ AND NOW, WHAT YOU ALL HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR

= The finished product:

[[image Dio%20Ssciptember%20rotated%20I%20hope]]

I do not know why it's so small. I can't do anything about it.

And that's all.
